headline: Simon® Announces Date For Its Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release And Conference Call
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced details for its third quarter earnings release and conference call.

raw.headline: Simon® Announces Date For Its Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release And Conference Call
raw.summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced details for its third quarter earnings release and conference call.

headline: Should Simon Property Group’s (SPG) Micro Space Platform Shift Investor Views on Retail Strategy?
summary: On September 19, 2025, IEM and Simon®? announced the launch of a new platform featuring modular, branded "micro spaces" in high-traffic mall areas, designed to help high-growth brands scale into physical retail with flexibility and lower risk. This approach creates turnkey, experiential spaces for emerging brands to engage shoppers directly while enabling Simon Property Group to attract a wider range of tenants and diversify its mall environments. We'll now explore how Simon's introduction...
